name: Isoceles' Abilities
description:
Isoceles' Abilities is a game where every 30 seconds, you cycle through sets of abilities, and when I say sets, I mean a whole 2 sets.

Controls

Unfortunately, I forgot about the part where nobody knows what "unspecified button" means.

  • 1, Q, or Left Arrow to activate Ability 1
  • 2, W, or Down Arrow to activate Ability 2
  • 3, E or Right Arrow to activate Ability 3

Press any of the above to start the game!
